thread.title: Gene Simmons of KISS Will Pitch Most Anything

author: Jacquie McNish and Vipal Monga
title: Gene Simmons of KISS Will Pitch Most Anything
text:
TORONTO—Rock ’n’ roll legend Gene Simmons has rarely met a brand he won’t endorse. And experience is no obstacle.
“What’s on my résumé? I know nothing,” he said.
That includes his latest venture as CEO—that’s Chief Evangelist Officer—of a fledgling, money-losing Vancouver marijuana producer that aspires to make it big when recreational... To Read the Full Story Subscribe Sign In
